title: [1.13.2]如何探测玩家副手是否存在含有nbt物品
author: 陈大哥哥

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content: execute as @a if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,tag:{}}]}] run say 我副手的五品有附加 tag 定义

replies.author: 陈大哥哥
